messages.message: Hello czar :) I think we should discuss a few things. A dmz of Silesia and Prussia would benefit us both. Let me know what you think. Also, there are plenty of joint risks to us both, particularly as the game progresses. Let me know if you've got any interest working together
messages.input: Message from GERMANY:'Hello czar :) I think we should discuss a few things. A dmz of Silesia and Prussia would benefit us both. Let me know what you think. Also, there are plenty of joint risks to us both, particularly as the game progresses. Let me know if you've got any interest working together'.If the cicero recommended order for me is: F STP/SC - BOT, A MOS - UKR, A WAR - GAL, F SEV - BLA. Should I trust GERMANY?
messages.output: You should trust GERMANY. Their proposal for a demilitarized zone of Silesia and Prussia aligns with your strategic interests, demonstrating a willingness to collaborate for mutual benefit and mitigate potential risks that could affect both of your positions in the game.

messages.message: Hm I'm getting your messages only in email form. Not to worry. Yes, I did say Prussia in my original message. I think the Baltic sea sounds fair enough as well. Why don't we work together toward those ends? I'm not shocked at the idea Britain might be looking to come for me
messages.input: Message from GERMANY:'Hm I'm getting your messages only in email form. Not to worry. Yes, I did say Prussia in my original message. I think the Baltic sea sounds fair enough as well. Why don't we work together toward those ends? I'm not shocked at the idea Britain might be looking to come for me'.If the cicero recommended order for me is: F STP/SC - BOT, A MOS - UKR, A WAR - GAL, F SEV - BLA. Should I trust GERMANY?
messages.output: You should trust GERMANY. Their acknowledgment of discussing the demilitarized zones in Prussia and the Baltic Sea shows consistency with the initial proposal, indicating a genuine effort to establish a cooperative relationship and jointly address potential threats, such as British aggression.

messages.message:
Hi germany! Are you up for Sil as a DMZ? It would be in both of our best interests if we didn't get in a fight early on, as both of our great powers already have a lot to deal with on our sides of the map. Looking forwards to a great game!

-Russia
messages.input:
My response to GERMANY:'Hi germany! Are you up for Sil as a DMZ? It would be in both of our best interests if we didn't get in a fight early on, as both of our great powers already have a lot to deal with on our sides of the map. Looking forwards to a great game!

-Russia'.
